text: A new malware called 'Locky' is targeting the financial industry.
A phishing campaign is underway, targeting employees of a major tech company.
A DDoS attack has taken down the servers of a popular gaming service.
A zero-day vulnerability has been discovered in a widely used web browser.
Hackers are using social engineering to gain access to corporate networks.
A ransomware attack has encrypted the files of a hospital.
